  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_71ff6db623fc9b7a7d4d2dab1d1ef6d103c93d03</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_71ff6db623fc9b7a7d4d2dab1d1ef6d103c93d03</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Constructive and destructive interference</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konstruktive und Auslöschung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Interférence constructive et destructive</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Interferência constructive e destrutiva</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Interferenza costruttiva e distruttiva</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εποικοδομητική και καταστρεπτική παρέμβαση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Interferencia constructiva y destructiva</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These illustrations show the constructive interference of a pair of in step identical waves (top) and a pair of out-of-step identical waves (bottom).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">resultant wave</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">destructive interference</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">identical waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">in-step</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">out-of-step</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen zeigen die konstruktive Störung
eines Paares in identischer Wellen des Jobsteps (Oberseite) und des 
Paares Heraus-vonjobstep identischer Wellen (Unterseite).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces illustrations montrent l'interférence 
constructive d'une paire de dans vagues identiques d'étape (dessus) 
et d'une paire de vagues identiques de dehors-de-étape (bas).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas ilustrações mostram a interferência 
constructive de um par em ondas idênticas da etapa (alto) e de um par
de ondas idênticas da para fora-$$$-ETAPA (fundo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste illustrazioni mostrano l'interferenza 
costruttiva di un accoppiamento nelle onde identiche di punto (parte 
superiore) e di un accoppiamento delle onde identiche di 
fuori-de-punto (parte inferiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις εμφανίζουν εποικοδομητική 
παρέμβαση ενός ζευγαριού στα ίδια κύματα βημάτων (κορυφή) και 
ενός ζευγαριού των ίδιων κυμάτων έξω-$$$-ΒΗΜΑΤΩΝ (κατώτατο 
σημείο).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas ilustraciones muestran la interferencia 
constructiva de un par en de las ondas idénticas del paso de 
progresión (tapa) y de un par de las ondas idénticas del hacia 
fuera-de-paso de progresio'n (fondo).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">resultierende Welle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auslöschung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">identische Wellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spann</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heraus-vonjobstep</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vague résultante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vagues</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">interférence destructive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vagues identiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">in-step</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">dehors-de-étape</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">onda resultante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ondas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">interferência destrutiva</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ondas idênticas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">in-step</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">para fora-$$$-ETAPA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">onda risultante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">onde</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">interferenza distruttiva</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">onde identiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">in-step</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fuori-de-punto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επακόλουθο κύμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κύματα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">καταστρεπτική παρέμβαση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ίδια κύματα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ταρσός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">έξω-$$$-ΒΉΜΑ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">onda resultante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ondas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">interferencia destructiva</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ondas idénticas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">empenie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">hacia fuera-de-paso de progresio'n</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
